title: Windows 10 location service and privacy  Microsoft privacy
description: When your location is used by a location-aware app or Windows service or feature, your location information and recent location history are stored on your device. title: Share your Google Photos library with a partner - Android -
description: Above "Shared library," tap your partner's name. Then, tap More Shared library settings . Turn off Notifications .
